definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: town in Judah (√ dub.);—[[יַתִּיר]] Jos 15:48, LXX I(e)qer; elsewh. [[יַתִּר]], Levitical city Jos 21:14 (both P), LXX Ailwm, A LXXL Ieqer, 1Ch 6:42, LXX [v:1Ch 6:43] Ieqqar, A Ieqer; prob. = [[יַתִּר]] 1Sa 30:27, LXX Geqqor, A Eieqer;—acc, to Onom. = Ieqeira, village 20 miles from Eleuthropolis, Lag:Onom. 266, 133; ed. 2, p. 268; identified by Rob:BR. i, 494 (who, however, questions ’ ([[ע]]) = [[י]]) Bd:Pal. 3, 153 with ’ Attîr, halfway between Hebron and Milḥ; so, ‘perh.,’ Buhl:Geogr. § 91, p. 164; this not certain, cf. Di.
